FuncDef:
The timer df-delay command specifies a DF election delay.
The undo timer df-delay command restores the default DF election delay.
By default, a DF election is performed after a delay of 60s.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a DF election delay.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 1200, in seconds.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a dual-homing scenario where interface-based DF election is configured, the following commands must be run on each of two PEs:
Run the timer df-delay 0 command to prevent the long existence of dual backup devices during a switchback and therefore helps prevent a traffic interruption.Run the evpn enhancement port command to prevent the access network from receiving duplicate traffic from the two PEs.
